text:
I moved a similar community from slack to rocketchat.
It went surprisingly smoothly. Suddenly having access to the whole archive felt great.
Rocketchat has threads now, although last time I checked they weren't very usable.
OTOH it's a different kind of interaction, but I think a discourse forum is better for long-form discussion and accessibility.
